column4: http://ubuntuforums.org: "Or, Sign in using your LaunchpadID" I have enterd my Launchpad Id as given by my Launchpad account. I obtain: "You have entered an invalid username or password." What goes wrong here?
: click the or, sign in using your launchpad ID link
I will be directed through another two sites and at the end to a form where I am asked to enter a User name and a password. This is no improvement.
: sorry, i don't have a launchpad account
